1. The following conditions attached to planning consent 2020/3152/FUL, dated 04/03/2021, should now read as:

Condition 2

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Drawings:
1425_S3 (PL) 001; 1425_S3 (PL) 100; 1425_S3 (PL) 101; 1425_S3 (PL) 102; 1425_S3 (PL)
130; 1425_S3 (PL) 160; 1425_S3 (PL) 161; 1425_S3 (PL) 162; 1425_S3 (PL) 230; 16662-100 - PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN; 16662-101 - PROPOSED ROOF PLAN; 16662-102 - PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION; 16662-103 - PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION; 16662-104 - PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION; 16662-105 - PROPOSED LOWER GROUND FLOOR PLAN; Existing & Proposed Site Plan ref. 7828-D-AIA (Rev D); Application Form & Cover Letter by Savils dated 30th October 2020; Arboricultural Impact Assessment (Rev D) by Hayden's dated 4th September 2020; Construction Management Statement by Knight Harwood dated 18th August 2020; Delivery & Servicing Management Plan by RGP dated September 2021; Design & Access statement Part 1 and Part 2 dated September 2020; and Sustainable Design and Construction Statement by Hurley Palmer Flatt dated 22nd October 2020

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

Condition 10
CONDITION: The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the Delivery and Servicing Plan (DSP) by RGP dated September 2021 ref. JACO/20/5293/DSMP01 and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To ensure that the resulting servicing arrangements are satisfactory in terms of their impact on highway safety and the free-flow of traffic.
